name: 3D Home Architect Foundation Floor Plan
summary: Learn about .PL0 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Broderbund no longer develops 3D Home Architect Deluxe.

description: Building foundation floor plan created with 3D Home Architect Deluxe, a home design program; stores the layout of the house's structural foundation; the actual ground floor layout is stored in a .PL1 file.
